title: Intelex Pink Bunny WARMIES Cozy Plush Heatable Lavender Scented Stuffed Animal
description: PINK BUNNY WARMIES Cozy Plush Heatable Lavender Scented Stuffed Animal A novel collection of fully microwavable soft toys, Warmies? are an attractive colorful range available in a variety of different styles and fabrics. Warmnies make the perfect bed time companion and are gently scented with lavender for a perfect nights sleep. Follow the directions and pop them in the microwave to make them warm, cuddly and softly fragranced with lavender. About 10 - 12 inches tall Weighs about 1.5 to 2 pounds Suitable for children of all ages Fully microwavable plush soft toy Manufactured using only the highest quality super soft fabrics Filled with specially treated millet grains and dried lavender flower Wipe with damp cloth to clean Can also be used as a cold pack by simply placing in a plastic bag and putting it in the freezer
